Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
